```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.width=10,
  fig.height=4)

library(dygraphs)
library(dplyr)
library(xts)
library(shiny)

source("R/profile.R")
source("R/utils.R")
```

```{r max}
params$f1_meta

params$f2_meta

get_powercurve_table(params$max_1, params$max_2, 
                     params$in_fit_1_label, params$in_fit_2_label)
```
```{r plot}
renderPlot(powercurve_plot(params$max_1, params$max_2, 
                           params$in_fit_1_label, params$in_fit_2_label))
```

```{r plots, fig.width=10, fig.height=2.5}
dat <- params$dat

get_dygraph(dat$power)

get_dygraph(dat$elevation)

get_dygraph(dat$heartrate)

get_dygraph(dat$cadence)
```
